title: Software Engineering Manager - AVConference Power & Performance
summary: The Audio & Media Technologies (AMT) group provides the audio and media foundation across all of Apple's innovative products. Seeking an experienced software engineering manager to lead the conferencing aspects with a focus on Power & Performance!
description: Our team is responsible for implementing software services for realtime audio video conferencing and media distribution systems. Looking for a strong engineering manager with management experience and excellent conceptual understanding of media systems and software design.
key_qualifications: Ability to lead multiple projects under driven time constraints, mentor and develop team, experience with development in an embedded real-time environment, attention to detail.
education_experience: B.S or M.S in EE/CE/CS with a strong focus in software engineering
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay range for this role is between $181,000 and $313,000. Also includes opportunities for growth, employee stock programs, comprehensive medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, discounted products and free services, educational expense reimbursement, discretionary bonuses, and relocation.
